## 3.3 初めてのカーネル

```
cd $HOME/workspace/mikanos && git checkout osbook_day03a
cd ./kernel

clang++ -O2 -Wall -g --target=x86_64-elf -ffreestanding -mno-red-zone -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -std=c++17 -c main.cpp
ld.lld --entry KernelMain -z norelro --image-base 0x100000 --static -o kernel.elf main.o

cd $HOME/edk2 && source edksetup.sh && build

$HOME/osbook/devenv/run_qemu.sh $HOME/edk2/Build/MikanLoaderX64/DEBUG_CLANG38/X64/Loader.efi $HOME/workspace/mikanos/kernel/kernel.elf
```

```
(qemu) info registers
RAX=0000000000100000 RBX=000000003effef18 RCX=0000000000000000 RDX=0000000000000000
RSI=000000003feaca08 RDI=000000003feac9e0 RBP=000000003fea8850 RSP=000000003fea8850
```

## 3.5 カーネルからピクセルを描く

```
cd $HOME/workspace/mikanos && git checkout osbook_day03c

cd $HOME/workspace/mikanos/kernel
source $HOME/osbook/devenv/buildenv.sh
clang++ $CPPFLAGS -O2 -Wall -g --target=x86_64-elf -ffreestanding -mno-red-zone -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -std=c++17 -c main.cpp
ld.lld $LDFLAGS --entry KernelMain -z norelro --image-base 0x100000 --static -o kernel.elf main.o

cd $HOME/edk2 && source edksetup.sh && build
$HOME/osbook/devenv/run_qemu.sh $HOME/edk2/Build/MikanLoaderX64/DEBUG_CLANG38/X64/Loader.efi $HOME/workspace/mikanos/kernel/kernel.elf
```
